Green text used currently to display EVA hints (such as "[F]: Board") is usually ok as most of backgrounds in KSP are black or generally dark. But there are situations when it's not just about being able to read them, but to even notice they are there. Such as in this picture:

I would like to suggest to give these hints a black outline so they stand out and remain readable also on bright backgrounds. Something like this:

Would be nice on other things too. I can hardly ever read the docking distance when the ship in front is lit up.

Keep having to spin cameras.
